about_the_game:
Welcome to Dread, a spine-chilling first-person multiplayer dungeon crawler that will keep you on the edge of your seat. You must descend through the darkness and twisted corridors filled with horrors beyond imagination. The stakes are high, and failure is not an option, as you must escape the dungeon before the only escape is death itself.

As you delve deeper into the dungeon, the challenges will become more sinister, the enemies more deadly, and the rewards more rewarding. Every turn is a risk as each step could be your last. With each passing moment, the darkness closes in around you and dread begins to seep into your very soul.

In Dread, teamwork is critical, as you work with other players to overcome the horrors that await you. With a range of weapons and skills at your disposal, you must work together to outsmart the dungeon's traps and monsters or suffer a gruesome fate.

But beware, as the dungeon is not the only enemy you face. Other players will stop at nothing to ensure their own escape, leaving you behind with not even the shirt on your back. Only the strongest of wills and most cunning of heart have a chance at survival through the dreaded descent.

Are you ready to face your fears and embark on the ultimate test of survival? Can you escape the dungeon, overcoming the horrors that lurk within? Take your chance and don’t forget to bring a bag.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 7 64-Bit or later
  • Processor: Intel Core i5 2500K or AMD equivalent
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 660 2 GB or AMD equivalent
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 15 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10 64-Bit
  • Processor: Intel Core i7 4790K or AMD equivalent
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 970 or AMD equivalent
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 15 GB available space

short_description: Dread is a multiplayer horror dungeon crawler. Work with others to explore, loot, and get the hell out before all hope is lost. Face the horrors of monsters and players alike using weapons and skills attuned to your liking. Struggle to survive, survive to win.
